head.title: Metro Business; Online Utility to Buy Online Phone Service

identified-content.classifier: Top/Classifieds/Job Market/Job Categories/Technology, Telecommunications and Internet

hedline.hl1: Metro Business; Online Utility to Buy Online Phone Service

abstract.p: Utility.com, an online utility company, will acquire VCom.com, a Manhattan company that uses Internet to provide long-distance telephone service (S)

block.p: Utility.com, an online utility company, announced that it was planning to acquire VCom.com, a Manhattan company that uses the Internet to provide long-distance telephone service, officials at both companies said yesterday.

Utility.com, based in Albany, Calif., plans to begin operating in New York State later this year. The deal is expected to help it enter the telecommunications industry, officials said. They expect to complete the acquisition later this summer.

Utility.com, an online utility company, announced that it was planning to acquire VCom.com, a Manhattan company that uses the Internet to provide long-distance telephone service, officials at both companies said yesterday.

Utility.com, based in Albany, Calif., plans to begin operating in New York State later this year. The deal is expected to help it enter the telecommunications industry, officials said. They expect to complete the acquisition later this summer.
Utility.com provides multiple utility services to consumers. VCom.com has developed the technology used by many online telephone service providers, officials added.
Steven Dresner, the chief executive of VCom.com, will be joining Utility.com, officials said. VCom.com, which is based in Midtown, will most likely keep its offices in Manhattan, they added.
